mapper.select: select r.id from reward r left join reward_attribute ra_m on r.id = ra_m.domain_id and ra_m.status = 1 and ra_m.entity_attribute_id = 8 where year(ra_m.date) = year(#{month}) and month(ra_m.date) = month(#{month})
mapper.delete: delete from reward where id in #{i}
delete from reward_attribute where domain_id in #{i}
